title: UAE warns citizens in Spain as storm Leonardo triggers floods and evacuations
summary_full: The UAE Embassy in Madrid has issued a critical safety advisory for Emirati citizens in Spain due to Storm Leonardo, which has caused severe flooding and evacuations. Citizens are urged to remain vigilant, avoid affected areas, and follow official guidance. The embassy also advises registration on the 'Tawajudi' service for emergency assistance.
